definition: violent action that is hostile and usually unprovoked
details:
noun
- violent action that is hostile and usually unprovoked
= synonyms: aggression
- a hostile or very unfriendly disposition
= example: a hostile or very unfriendly disposition
= synonyms: ill will
- the feeling of a hostile person
= example: the feeling of a hostile person
= synonyms: ill will, enmity
- a state of deep-seated ill-will
= synonyms: antagonism, enmity
